mapper.select: select rownum no, c.* from (select cs.* from MASTER_WEB_CS_TBL cs where user_id = (select id from MASTER_USER_INFO_TBL where admin = 'Y') and category = #{category}) c order by no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_WEB_CS_TBL (id, title, content, user_id, share_date, filename, filepath, category) VALUES (seq_cs_id.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE MASTER_WEB_CS_TBL SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE ID = #{id}
